description:
Joomla training for beginners and advanced users!

What you get with this course?

  • Learn how to develop a professional, modern, good looking website using Joomla (latest version)
  • Learn how to make money as a website developer (1400€ -3400€ per month)
  • Learn how to interact with clients effectively as a webdeveloper (freelancer or as a corporate)
  • Learn some selling tips to maximize profit, Up-sell , Cross-sell
  • Premium resources (templates, components, modules, plugins)
  • Personal, 1 on1 daily support and interaction with my students
  • 1 year free hosting!

+More Bonuses!

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

You will have a constant, 1 on 1 support throughout the course! My goal is to help you achieve this course's goals or you get your money back! Isn't that fair?

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

ATTENTION FOR THE HOSTING BONUS!

Every student enrolled in this course, after finishing and sharing this course, contact me though udemy pm system and you will have a free hosting package for 1 year to upload a website!

*Students with coupons lower that half price or refunded are excluded from this bonus. Contact me if there is anything you want to ask!

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

After this course you will be able to:

  • create professional, responsive websites using Joomla!
  • sell each website for 700€ - 1700€ !
  • save money creating your own (personal or business) website!

Who is this course for?

  • Beginner web developers
  • Advanced web developers who want to use Joomla CMS
  • Those who want to start their own web development business
  • Those who want to create their own (personal or business) website and save money
  • Anyone who want to make money!

What's this course about?

This course is about learning web development with Joomla 3 (CMS) in 3 easy steps through a hotel website showcase from scratch! Main goal is to learn developing websites in order to make money as a website developer not just creating some tutorials!

The structure of the course:

This is course contains a 3 basic steps website development process:

    1. Website requirement analysis – Talking about goals

    2. Website design – Visualizing the main picture

    3. Website development – Getting things done!
title: Joomla 3 : Develop a Professional Website in 3 Simple Steps!
